response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we are confident it could be worth $10,000 to you. Considering this, we are offering the product to you at an exclusive price of $8,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We believe this price aligns well with both our objectives and your budget. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the opportunity to work together.", "product_price": 8500}
